name: Get to the Ship
description:
Modifications 

1) Custom Level - I add another for a total of 2. Each level requires an element of puzzle solving and parkour to reach the ship

2) Custom Music for level 1. This music was intentionally mellow spacey music so that the player felt relaxed but intrigued. Music made in Ableton live studio. 

3) Custom Music for level 2. This music was intentionally faster and more intense to give the player the sense that the challenges are increasing.  Music made in Ableton live studio.
